collection.shortDescription: The constraint specifies which entity collection will be searched for results.

filterGroupBy.shortDescription: The container encapsulating filter constraint limiting the facet groups returned in facet summary.

attributeGreaterThanEquals.shortDescription: Compares value of the attribute with passed value and checks if the value of that attribute is greater than or equals to the passed value.

filterBy.shortDescription: The container encapsulating inner filter constraint into one main constraint that is required by the query.

priceBetween.shortDescription: The constraint checks if entity has price for sale within the passed range of prices (both ends are inclusive).

entityHaving.shortDescription: The container allowing to filter entities by having references to entities managed by evitaDB that  + match inner filtering constraints. This container resembles the SQL inner join clauses where the `entityHaving` + contains the filtering condition on particular join.

priceInCurrency.shortDescription: The constraint filters out all entities that lack selling price in specified currency.

userFilter.shortDescription: The container for constraints that are controlled by the user (client UI widgets).  + It is used mainly to distinguish between user constraint (refining the search) and program defined  + constraints (considered mandatory), when the extra results are computed.

attributeContains.shortDescription: Compares value of the attribute with passed value and checks if the text value of that attribute contains part of passed text (case-sensitive).

excluding.shortDescription: The constraint narrows hierarchy within parent constraint to exclude specified hierarchy subtrees from search.

priceValidIn.shortDescription: The constraint checks if entity has selling price valid at the passed moment.

attributeLessThan.shortDescription: Compares value of the attribute with passed value and checks if the value of that attribute is less than the passed value.

priceInPriceLists.shortDescription: The constraint filters out all entities that lack selling price in specified price lists.  + Order of price lists also defines priority for selecting the entity selling price - the price from first price  + list in the list will be used as a selling price for the entire entity.

entityLocaleEquals.shortDescription: The constraint if at least one of entity locales (derived from entity attributes or associated data) equals to the passed one.

attributeGreaterThan.shortDescription: Compares value of the attribute with passed value and checks if the value of that attribute is greater than the passed value.

facetHaving.shortDescription: The container allowing to filter entities by having references to entities managed by evitaDB that  + match the inner filter constraint. This container resembles the SQL inner join clauses and works in cooperation  + with facet summary requirement.

or.shortDescription: The container that combines inner constraints with [logical OR](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Logical_disjunction).

attributeEquals.shortDescription: Compares value of the attribute with passed value and checks if they are both equal.

hierarchyWithinRoot.shortDescription: The constraint if entity is placed inside the defined hierarchy tree starting at the root of the tree (or has reference to any hierarchical entity in the tree).

and.shortDescription: The container that combines inner constraints with [logical AND](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Logical_conjunction).

attributeBetween.shortDescription: Compares value of the attribute with passed value and checks if the value of that attribute is within the passed range (both ends are inclusive).

referenceHaving.shortDescription: The container allowing to filter entities by having references to entities managed by evitaDB that  + match the inner filter constraint. This container resembles the SQL inner join clauses.

not.shortDescription: The container that behaves as [logical NOT](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Negation) for the inner constraint.

attributeIs.shortDescription: The constraint if value of the attribute is same as passed special value.

attributeLessThanEquals.shortDescription: Compares value of the attribute with passed value and checks if the value of that attribute is less than or equals to the passed value.

having.shortDescription: The constraint narrows hierarchy within parent constraint to include specified hierarchy subtrees from search.

attributeStartsWith.shortDescription: Compares value of the attribute with passed value and checks if the text value of that attributes starts with passed text. (case-sensitive)

hierarchyWithin.shortDescription: The constraint if entity is placed inside the defined hierarchy tree (or has reference to any hierarchical entity in the tree).

directRelation.shortDescription: The constraint limits hierarchy within parent constraint to take only directly related entities into an account.

attributeEndsWith.shortDescription: Compares value of the attribute with passed value and checks if the text value of that attribute ends with passed text (case-sensitive).

excludingRoot.shortDescription: The constraint limits hierarchy within parent constraint to exclude the entities directly related to the searched root node.

attributeInSet.shortDescription: Compares value of the attribute with passed value and checks if the value of that attribute  + equals to at least one of the passed values.  + The constraint is equivalent to the multiple `equals` constraints combined with logical OR.

entityPrimaryKeyInSet.shortDescription: The constraint checks if primary key of the entity equals to at least one of the passed values.  + The constraint is equivalent to one or more `equals` constraints combined with logical OR.

attributeInRange.shortDescription: Compares value of the attribute with passed value and checks if the range value of that  + attribute contains the passed value within its limits (both ends are inclusive).  + The constraint can be used only for Range data type values.

entityProperty.shortDescription: The constraint sorts returned references by applying ordering constraint on referenced entity.

entityPrimaryKeyInFilter.shortDescription: The constraint sorts returned entities by ordering of the values specified `entityPrimaryKeysInSet` in filter.

referenceProperty.shortDescription: The constraint sorts returned entities or references by attribute specified on its reference in natural order.

priceNatural.shortDescription: The constraint sorts returned entities by selected price for sale.

entityPrimaryKeyExact.shortDescription: The constraint sorts returned entities by ordering of the values specified in arguments.

attributeNatural.shortDescription: The constraint sorts returned entities by natural ordering of the values in the specified attribute.

orderGroupBy.shortDescription: The container encapsulates order constraints that control the order of the facet groups in facet summary.

orderBy.shortDescription: The container encapsulates inner order constraints into one main constraint that is required by the query.

attributeSetInFilter.shortDescription: The constraint sorts returned entities by ordering of the values specified `attributeInSet` in filter sharing the same attribute name.

attributeSetExact.shortDescription: The constraint sorts returned entities by ordering of the values specified in arguments matching the entity attribute of specified name.

entityGroupProperty.shortDescription: The constraint sorts returned references by applying ordering constraint on referenced entity group.

entityPrimaryKeyNatural.shortDescription: The constraint sorts returned entities by primary key in specific order.

random.shortDescription: The constraint sorts returned entities randomly.

hierarchyOfReference.shortDescription: The constraint triggers computation of hierarchy statistics (how many matching children the hierarchy nodes have) of referenced hierarchical entities into response.

priceType.shortDescription: The constraint specifies which price type (with/without tax) will be used for handling filtering and sorting constraints.

dataInLocales.shortDescription: The constraint triggers fetching of the localized attributes or associated data in different/additional locales than the locale specified in filtering constraints (if any at all).

hierarchyOfSelf.shortDescription: The constraint triggers computation of hierarchy statistics (how many matching children the hierarchy nodes have) of same hierarchical collection into response.

fromNode.shortDescription: The constraint triggers computing the hierarchy subtree starting at pivot node.

distance.shortDescription: The constraint limits the traversing in stop at container at specified distance (number of nodes in path).

stopAt.shortDescription: The constraint defines the traversal stop condition that limits the scope of the returned hierarchy tree.

facetSummaryOfReference.shortDescription: The constraint triggers computation of facet summary of all facet in searched scope into response with custom \fetching\ settings for specific reference.

level.shortDescription: The constraint limits the traversing in stop at container at specified level from root.

facetGroupsDisjunction.shortDescription: Sets relation of facets in the specified groups towards facets in different groups to [logical OR](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Logical_disjunction) .

children.shortDescription: The constraint triggers computing the hierarchy subtree starting at currently requested hierarchy node in filter by constraint.

facetGroupsConjunction.shortDescription: Sets inter-facets relation within the specified groups to [logical AND](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Logical_conjunction).

fromRoot.shortDescription: The constraint triggers computing the hierarchy subtree starting at root level.

queryTelemetry.shortDescription: The constraint triggers computation of query telemetry (explaining what operations were performed and how long they took) in extra results of the response.

priceHistogram.shortDescription: The constraint triggers computation of the [histogram](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Histogram) of price for sale into response.

associatedDataContent.shortDescription: The constraint triggers fetching the entity associated data of specified names into the returned entities.

hierarchyContent.shortDescription: The constraint triggers fetching parent hierarchy entity parent chain and its bodies into returned main entities.

statistics.shortDescription: The constraint triggers computing the count of children for each returned hierarchy node.

facetGroupsNegation.shortDescription: [Negates](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Negation) the meaning of selected facets in specified  + facet groups in the sense that their selection would return entities that don't have any of those facets.

entityFetch.shortDescription: Returns richer entities instead of just entity references (empty container returns only entity body).

require.shortDescription: The container encapsulates inner require constraints into one main constraint that is required by the query

entityGroupFetch.shortDescription: Returns richer group entities instead of just entity references (empty container returns only entity body).

node.shortDescription: The constraint allows to locate the pivot hierarchy node.

attributeContent.shortDescription: The constraint triggers fetching the entity attributes into the returned entities.

strip.shortDescription: The constraint specifies which strip (subset) of found entities will be returned.

siblings.shortDescription: The constraint triggers computing the sibling axis for currently requested hierarchy node in filter by constraint or processed node by hierarchy parents axis.

priceContent.shortDescription: The constraint triggers fetching the entity prices into the returned entities.

page.shortDescription: The constraint specifies which page of found entities will be returned.

parents.shortDescription: The constraint triggers computing the hierarchy parent axis starting at currently requested hierarchy node in filter by constraint.

referenceContent.shortDescription: The constraint triggers fetching referenced entity bodies into returned main entities.

attributeHistogram.shortDescription: The constraint triggers computation of the [histogram](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Histogram) of specified attributes into response.

facetSummary.shortDescription: The constraint triggers computation of facet summary of all facet in searched scope into response with default \fetching\ settings for all referenced entities.
